sendingEvidence.summary: Sending evidence to support your answer

details.para1: If you have any evidence to support your answer, you can either email it or send it by post.
details.para2: Make sure it’s clearly marked with your appeal reference number:
details.postalAddress:
Birmingham ASC
HM Courts and Tribunals Service
Administrative Support Centre (ASC)
P O Box 14620
Birmingham
B16 6FR
details.closingPara: Useful evidence helps prove what you have said in your answer such as a letter from a doctor or someone who knows you well. You do not have to send in evidence if you don’t have any.
